overview.ovdesc: Internal file providing a details of the history of the invocation details held MD deal.Only the S(ee), P(rint) and L(ist) functions may be used in this application.

desc.p: The value date of debiting the INV.DR.ACCOUNT.
If INV.STATUS is Cancel then this field implies the date of invocation rejection.
Standard T24 date field with maximum of 8 characters.
Fields AMOUNT to CHRG.DET form a related multi value set.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
The bank where the funds are to be remitted, defaulted from corresponding MD.DEAL
Should have the values OUR, SHA or BEN only from the corresponding MD deal record
The receivers correspondent bank information defaulted from Md deal record
Identifies the Our correspondent bank information. (I.e., NOSTRO agent of the credit account currency).
Standard T24 numeric field with maximum of 30 characters.
Fields AMOUNT to CHRG.DET form a related multi value set.
The payment value date.
Standard T24 date field with maximum of 8 characters.
Fields AMOUNT to CHRG.DET form a related multi value set.
The exchange rate to be used between invocation debit account and invocation credit account . Defaulted from CorrespondingMD.DEAL record
Intermediary bank through which funds are to be routed.
The ID of this file is that of a valid MD.DEAL, in which an invocation has been executed and the Deal since authorized.
This file holds the details relating to each of the Invocation relating to the Deal. The update into this file takes place only after the Execution of the Invocation is authorized.
System Maintained.
The settlement account into which the invocation amount will be credited.
Fields AMOUNT to CHRG.DET form a related multi value set.
The bank where the funds are to be remitted, defaulted from corresponding MD.DEAL
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Identifies the beneficiary of the current invocation defined in INV.BENEFICIARY on MD.DEAL file.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with maximum of 35 characters.
Fields AMOUNT to CHRG.DET form a related multi value set.
Identifies the SWIFT codes for bank operation (MT103)
Valid codes are CRED, CRTS, SPAY, SPRI, SSTD.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field with maximum of 4 characters.
Fields AMOUNT to CHRG.DET form a related multi value set.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
